It is more convenient to set the CLASSPATH environment variable once and for all before running the examples.
The setClasspath.cmd script located in the $LOGBACK_HOME/logback-examples folder will configure the class path for the MS Windows platform. For Unix, the equivalent script is setClasspath.sh.
Please remember to adapt the LB_HOME variable for your local environment.

Please be aware that many examples will launch java classes along with configuration files. To access these files by using the same commands as written in the documentation, you will need to issue the commands in the $LOGBACK_HOME/logback-examples directory.
